metadata.description: The Movie Handbook is your official guide to: George and Harold, the Amazing Captain Underpants, mean old Mr. Krupp, and Professor P. Poopypants. Plus Melvin Sneedly, Cafeteria Lady Edith, the Hypno-Ring, the Turbo Toilet 2000, a pullout poster, and much, much more!
metadata.name: Captain Underpants Movie: Official Handbook
